section.heading: Issuance of End Gun Violence motor vehicle identification tags.

para.text: The Mayor shall design and make available for issue one or more motor vehicle identification tags to demonstrate support for ending gun violence in the District. The identification tags shall display the phrase "End Gun Violence".

A resident ordering an End Gun Violence identification tag shall pay a one-time application fee and a display fee each year thereafter. The application fee shall be $25, and the display fee shall be $20, or such other amount as may be established by the Mayor by rule.
The application fee and annual display fee shall be deposited into the Neighborhood Safety and Engagement Fund, established by § 7-2413.

section.codify:annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 23-234: § 4 of D.C. Law 23-234 provided that the creation of this section by § 2(a) of D.C. Law 23-234 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.
According to the Office of the Budget Director, D.C. Law 23-234 is currently funded. Therefore, this section has been implemented.
